instructions: # Exalted vs World of Darkness character sheet   **For use in the classic World of Darkness**  # Exalted vs World of Darkness character sheetBased on the [Exalted vs World of Darkness](https://www.patreon.com/posts/exalted-vs-world-23661124) fan supplement by Holden Shearer.## Features* *All attributes, skills, and so on are fill from the left.* * Health boxes toggle through bashing (/), lethal (X), and aggravated (*).* Essence and Willpower boxes toggle between unspent ( ) and spent (X).* Excess Essence boxes are blacked out based on Essence (dots) and Exalted Type.* Ox-Body Technique is its own attribute, and determines how many boxes to render.* Roll buttons for soak, initiative, dodge, parry, block, attacks and damage.* If there's something you want added, or you'd like to report a bug, please contact the author of this sheet.
